## validateData() function

Returns data which passes the corresponding typeGuard validation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function validateData<TypeGuards extends TypeGuardRecord>(data: any, typeGuards: TypeGuards): ValidatedData<TypeGuards>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | any | the set of data to validate |
|  typeGuards | TypeGuards | a record of type guard functions use to verify the data properties' type |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ValidatedData](./answers-react-components.validateddata.md)<!-- -->&lt;TypeGuards&gt;

a validated set of data
